Text: Vandy Team Get Together Reminder Reminder Remember that the Vanderbilt team get together is taking place this Thursday from pm to pm at the Front Porch Pub on Gray I hope to see you there For reference your link to this Invite is riidEWFPZQLYXVCWYUZGPPNX To see this invite and all of your invites click to your personal My Evite page tourfilehomepagestartPageunreghtmlliegi

Vandy Team Get TogetherGandy has sent you an Evite Invite To view your Invite simply click the following Web address riidEWFPZQLYXVCWYUZGPPNX This Evite Invite is covered by Evites privacy policy To view this privacy policy click here privacy Workin for the weekend With only two days to call your own youve got to make them count The Citysearch Weekend Guide makes workin for the weekend worth it cslinknsltreviteinvite Need some help See below Perhaps your Email program doesnt recognize the Web address as an active link No problem You can copy and paste the Web address into your Web browser Here are instructions on how to copy and paste a With your mouse highlight the entire Web address above b Select the EDIT menu and choose COPY c Go to your Web browser and click inside the window where you normally type a Web address to visit d Select the EDIT menu and choose PASTE e Now hit ENTER on your keyboard to take you to the Web address Its that easy If you would like further assistance were happy to help please send Email to Updated

John Hello and good Monday morning to you I briefly meet you while talking to Paul Racicot on Friday at Front Porch Pub With Matt working here in Freight you probably already know we are not well off these days Next on the chopping block is never a good place to be This is a forward question but what the hell I was wondering if you knew of any positions available in your area If you can believe it I am not ready to leave Enron behind yet Thanks for your help Regards Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas

REJohn Thanks for the note back My title is Specialist so I am the little man on the trading floor but since I have been here I have been kicking ass I enjoy trading and really didnt get the chance to dig into it deep Anyway take care and have a Happy Holiday Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas Original Message From Arnold John Sent Wednesday November AM To Gandy Kristin Subject RE Kristin Sorry for the delay Unfotunately I dont have any openings in my group right now If I hear of any positions open Ill give you a shout Can you remind me what title you have now John Original Message From Gandy Kristin Sent Monday November AM To Arnold John Subject John Hello and good Monday morning to you I briefly meet you while talking to Paul Racicot on Friday at Front Porch Pub With Matt working here in Freight you probably already know we are not well off these days Next on the chopping block is never a good place to be This is a forward question but what the hell I was wondering if you knew of any positions available in your area If you can believe it I am not ready to leave Enron behind yet Thanks for your help Regards Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas

REWell the way things are going around here lately I may want to cut my losses with the Big E and take my skills elsewhere Know any good headhunters Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas Original Message From Arnold John Sent Wednesday November AM To Gandy Kristin Subject RE The reason I asked is this sounds bad but right now the cheaper you are the easier time Ill have finding you a job Original Message From Gandy Kristin Sent Wednesday November AM To Arnold John Subject RE John Thanks for the note back My title is Specialist so I am the little man on the trading floor but since I have been here I have been kicking ass I enjoy trading and really didnt get the chance to dig into it deep Anyway take care and have a Happy Holiday Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas Original Message From Arnold John Sent Wednesday November AM To Gandy Kristin Subject RE Kristin Sorry for the delay Unfotunately I dont have any openings in my group right now If I hear of any positions open Ill give you a shout Can you remind me what title you have now John Original Message From Gandy Kristin Sent Monday November AM To Arnold John Subject John Hello and good Monday morning to you I briefly meet you while talking to Paul Racicot on Friday at Front Porch Pub With Matt working here in Freight you probably already know we are not well off these days Next on the chopping block is never a good place to be This is a forward question but what the hell I was wondering if you knew of any positions available in your area If you can believe it I am not ready to leave Enron behind yet Thanks for your help Regards Kristin Gandy Freight Markets Enron Global Markets Smith Street ECS Houston Texas

Vandy Team Get TogetherGandy has sent you an Evite Invite To view your Invite simply click the following Web address riidEWFPZQLYXVCWYUZGPPNX This Evite Invite is covered by Evites privacy policy To view this privacy policy click here privacy Workin for the weekend With only two days to call your own youve got to make them count The Citysearch Weekend Guide makes workin for the weekend worth it cslinknsltreviteinvite Need some help See below Perhaps your Email program doesnt recognize the Web address as an active link No problem You can copy and paste the Web address into your Web browser Here are instructions on how to copy and paste a With your mouse highlight the entire Web address above b Select the EDIT menu and choose COPY c Go to your Web browser and click inside the window where you normally type a Web address to visit d Select the EDIT menu and choose PASTE e Now hit ENTER on your keyboard to take you to the Web address Its that easy If you would like further assistance were happy to help please send Email to Updated

RE A friend of mineThank you very much for the follow up report I am sure Richard will be very enthusiastic about the opportunity to speak with you and your team I appreciate your help and please feel free to contact me if you or Shirley need assistance with logistics Again thank you and I look forward to working with you again this recruiting season Regards Kristin Original Message From Kaminski Vince Sent Wednesday May AM To Gandy Kristin Subject Re A friend of mine Kristin Thanks a lot for the resume We shall arrange a phone interview with Richard This is out standard procedure A phone interview is followed by the onsite interview after we determine what is the best team to interview the candidate Vince From Kristin nronXgate on PM To Vince J CT cc Subject A friend of mine Vince Last week I was contacted by one of my friends who is very interested in becoming an Enron employee He has a PHD and several years research and lab experience Richard is afraid that being a PHD is a dying breed and may need to go back to school to obtain an MBA I was wondering if you would mind looking at the attached resume to assess if you have any interest in Richard or if you feel I should encourage him to go back to school I am unclear as to the qualifications for your group so I apologize if this request is way off base Thank you for your help Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter Enron Corporation Smith Street EB Houston Texas File Richard Heo Resumedoc

Wharton Tiger Teamto the information that Christie Patrick emailed me the following people are assigned to Whartons Tiger Teams and These candidates per Vince Kaminskis request should receive offers for Summer Associate positions located in his Research Group Tiger Team Vincent Chen Mallik Deepa Jack Rejtman Kim Whitsel Tulika Bhalia Nicholas Levitt I am uncertain based on the emailed information from Christie if this is a student or a TA Can either Vince or Christie verify this information please Tiger Team Clay DeGiacinto Steve Lessar Vittal Maheshram Omar Bassel Dennis Feerick Marc Jason Cummins The following candidates interviewed with the regular on campus Wharton team on and were not passed onto the second round interviews With that information I am not sure if we will offer those candidates positions for the summer program Kim Whitsel Team Clay DeGiacinto Team Gustavo Pallazzi Team Edson Otani Team I also have that Heather Thorne is the teaching assistant and Donna Piazze is the professor for the project Can you also verify that information Vince if you would please verify and give me the okay via email then I will contact these candidates by phone to inform them they will be receiving an offer from Enron But before I do anything I want to make sure this information is correct and I am not excluding or adding any members that should receive an offer Thank you Kristin Gandy

Wharton InterviewsForwarded by Kristin GandyNAEnron on PM From Kristin Gandy PM To Jeremy ES cc Bryan KiteEnron nron Communications Michele Nezi MarvinEnron nron Communications Subject Wharton Interviews This is a request for your interview participation The Associate Program will be on the Wharton MBA campus interviewing summer ASSOCIATE interns next week Due to business reasons previously scheduled interviewers from the Wharton team have had to cancel their participation Currently I need two interviewers for Monday February th and two interviewers for Tuesday February th Please let me know of your availability Campus interviews are scheduled as follows Place Rittenhouse Hotel West Rittenhouse Square Philadelphia PA Date Monday February th Tuesday February th Day One Interviews Day Two Interviews Time am to pm am to pm Interviewers Bryan Kite confirmed Michele Nezi Marvin confirmed In the event that you have scheduling conflicts and cannot participate any referrals at the Director or VP level would be greatly appreciated As always thank you for your time and please contact me ext if you have any questions Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiting

Re Carnegie Interviews Super FridayThank you very much but I ended up finding interviewers for all the time slots Paulo has volunteered to interview for hour thank you for suggesting his name Kristin Vince J CT PM To Kristin NRON cc Kevin NRON Alex NRON Paulo CT Bob nron Vince J CT Subject Re Carnegie Interviews Super Friday Kristin I shall be tied up with the Wharton group all day Friday I am forwarding the message to some members of the Research Group I hope some of them will be available Vince PS To the Research Group Can you please help Kristin Enron North America Corp From Kristin Gandy ENRON PM To Alyse nron cc Vince J CT Ann KoriothEnron nron Communications Terry nron Traci WarnerEnron nron Communications Erik CT Laura HowenstineEnron nron Communications Sarah nronXGate Subject Re Carnegie Interviews Super Friday Okay group it is Tuesday and we have heard from no volunteers We only need minutes of your time Is any one available on this Friday to interview Please Help Kristin From Alyse Herasimchuk PM To Vince J CT Ann KoriothEnron nron Communications Terry nron Traci WarnerEnron nron Communications Erik CT Laura HowenstineEnron nron Communications Sarah WesnerCorpEnron cc Kristin nron Subject Carnegie Interviews Super Friday We have one last group of candidates coming in for final round interviews on Friday January th We need Interviewers for half a day am to am Please let me know if you can be available for the entire morning or what times you could be available am am am am I appreciate any help you can offer in submitting names for those who may be able to interview if you can not Thanks Alyse Herasimchuk Recruiting Coordinator Associate Analyst Program

Carnegie Mellon Cc I just spoke with Vince and asked him if he would be available to interview one last candidate on Monday He said no problem that both he and Stinson would be available for interviews Could you please put on Vinces schedule one interview at amam Stinsons interview will be from amam I will just bring the candidate to their offices so they do not have to show up early If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at extension Thank you very much Kristin Gandy

Re My sonI left a message with one of Yarons roommates on Thursday afternoon for him to call ASAP for an interview on Sunday I guess he took the wrong number down but I do not understand this because the roommate read the number back to me and it was correct When I did not hear from Yaron I called on Friday and left a voice mail with my cell and office numbers I still did not hear from him and called again yesterday morning I finally received a call at pm yesterday but by that time my team and myself were half way back to Houston Sorry it did not work out I have a call into Charlene Jackson as to how she wants me to proceed and I will get back with you Kristin Vince J CT AM To John NRON Kristin nron cc Subject My son FYI Vince Forwarded by Vince J KaminskiHOUECT on AM Shmuel Oren on PM To cc Subject My son Vince Apparently the recruiter spoke to one of my sons roommates and left a phone number which he tried several times and got busy signals Today she called just before you called me and left her cellphone number but he was in classes all morning and got the message in the afternoon I really appreciate your going out of yourway to help Perhaps there will be another opportunity Shmuel

Re Carnegie Mellon Team MeetingI do not have a phone right now so I will have to call as soon as they get me up and running I went ahead and sent out the dates we have on schedule currently with the intention that if we get new dates they will be announced in the team meeting on Thursday Hope that is okay I needed to get a message out to participant soon so we dont get in a bind in a couple of weeks Kristin Vince J CT AM To Kristin NRON cc Vince J CT Subject Re Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Kristin What about the visit to the campus on Nov Any resolution Vince Kristin NRON AM To Vince J CT Kent nron Dorothy NRON Kevin NRON Andre BeskrowniEnron nron Communications Gaurav CT John NRON John B nron Dave ateway cc Judy CT Subject Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Greetings Carnegie Mellon Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at Carnegie Mellon University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Carnegie Mellons Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus December and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for August st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Cc Carnegie Mellon Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at Carnegie Mellon University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Carnegie Mellons Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus December and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for August st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

MIT Team Meeting Cc MIT Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at MIT University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Sloans Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus November and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for September st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

Re Recruiting at CarnegieMellonam so sorry that we keep missing one another Are you available at any time tomorrow so I can come visit to talk about Carnegie Mellon recruiting this fall Kristin Vince J CT PM To John B NRON cc Vince J CT Kristin nron Subject Re Recruiting at CarnegieMellon John I havent received the invitation yet to the Sep th meeting I shall contact you Thursday regarding the CMU presentation Vince John B NRON PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Recruiting at CarnegieMellon Vince I understand that you are the lead recruiter for CMU As you know I am the only alum from that school in Enrons Associate Program I assume I will be joining you for our corporate presentation on at am Please let me know what I can do to help prepare for this event Enron and GSIA are a great fit so I want this recruiting effort to go well Are you also giving a talklecture to the computational finance students If so what time Maybe we can schedule a lunch with Duane Seppi I look forward to hearing from you John Gordon

Re My sonI left a message with one of Yarons roommates on Thursday afternoon for him to call ASAP for an interview on Sunday I guess he took the wrong number down but I do not understand this because the roommate read the number back to me and it was correct When I did not hear from Yaron I called on Friday and left a voice mail with my cell and office numbers I still did not hear from him and called again yesterday morning I finally received a call at pm yesterday but by that time my team and myself were half way back to Houston Sorry it did not work out I have a call into Charlene Jackson as to how she wants me to proceed and I will get back with you Kristin Vince J CT AM To John NRON Kristin nron cc Subject My son FYI Vince Forwarded by Vince J KaminskiHOUECT on AM Shmuel Oren on PM To cc Subject My son Vince Apparently the recruiter spoke to one of my sons roommates and left a phone number which he tried several times and got busy signals Today she called just before you called me and left her cellphone number but he was in classes all morning and got the message in the afternoon I really appreciate your going out of yourway to help Perhaps there will be another opportunity Shmuel

Wharton InterviewsForwarded by Kristin GandyNAEnron on PM From Kristin Gandy PM To Jeremy ES cc Bryan KiteEnron nron Communications Michele Nezi MarvinEnron nron Communications Subject Wharton Interviews This is a request for your interview participation The Associate Program will be on the Wharton MBA campus interviewing summer ASSOCIATE interns next week Due to business reasons previously scheduled interviewers from the Wharton team have had to cancel their participation Currently I need two interviewers for Monday February th and two interviewers for Tuesday February th Please let me know of your availability Campus interviews are scheduled as follows Place Rittenhouse Hotel West Rittenhouse Square Philadelphia PA Date Monday February th Tuesday February th Day One Interviews Day Two Interviews Time am to pm am to pm Interviewers Bryan Kite confirmed Michele Nezi Marvin confirmed In the event that you have scheduling conflicts and cannot participate any referrals at the Director or VP level would be greatly appreciated As always thank you for your time and please contact me ext if you have any questions Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiting

Wharton Tiger Teamto the information that Christie Patrick emailed me the following people are assigned to Whartons Tiger Teams and These candidates per Vince Kaminskis request should receive offers for Summer Associate positions located in his Research Group Tiger Team Vincent Chen Mallik Deepa Jack Rejtman Kim Whitsel Tulika Bhalia Nicholas Levitt I am uncertain based on the emailed information from Christie if this is a student or a TA Can either Vince or Christie verify this information please Tiger Team Clay DeGiacinto Steve Lessar Vittal Maheshram Omar Bassel Dennis Feerick Marc Jason Cummins The following candidates interviewed with the regular on campus Wharton team on and were not passed onto the second round interviews With that information I am not sure if we will offer those candidates positions for the summer program Kim Whitsel Team Clay DeGiacinto Team Gustavo Pallazzi Team Edson Otani Team I also have that Heather Thorne is the teaching assistant and Donna Piazze is the professor for the project Can you also verify that information Vince if you would please verify and give me the okay via email then I will contact these candidates by phone to inform them they will be receiving an offer from Enron But before I do anything I want to make sure this information is correct and I am not excluding or adding any members that should receive an offer Thank you Kristin Gandy

RE A friend of mineThank you very much for the follow up report I am sure Richard will be very enthusiastic about the opportunity to speak with you and your team I appreciate your help and please feel free to contact me if you or Shirley need assistance with logistics Again thank you and I look forward to working with you again this recruiting season Regards Kristin Original Message From Kaminski Vince Sent Wednesday May AM To Gandy Kristin Subject Re A friend of mine Kristin Thanks a lot for the resume We shall arrange a phone interview with Richard This is out standard procedure A phone interview is followed by the onsite interview after we determine what is the best team to interview the candidate Vince From Kristin nronXgate on PM To Vince J CT cc Subject A friend of mine Vince Last week I was contacted by one of my friends who is very interested in becoming an Enron employee He has a PHD and several years research and lab experience Richard is afraid that being a PHD is a dying breed and may need to go back to school to obtain an MBA I was wondering if you would mind looking at the attached resume to assess if you have any interest in Richard or if you feel I should encourage him to go back to school I am unclear as to the qualifications for your group so I apologize if this request is way off base Thank you for your help Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter Enron Corporation Smith Street EB Houston Texas File Richard Heo Resumedoc

MIT Team Meeting Cc MIT Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at MIT University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Sloans Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus November and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for September st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

Re Carnegie Interviews Super FridayThank you very much but I ended up finding interviewers for all the time slots Paulo has volunteered to interview for hour thank you for suggesting his name Kristin Vince J CT PM To Kristin NRON cc Kevin NRON Alex NRON Paulo CT Bob nron Vince J CT Subject Re Carnegie Interviews Super Friday Kristin I shall be tied up with the Wharton group all day Friday I am forwarding the message to some members of the Research Group I hope some of them will be available Vince PS To the Research Group Can you please help Kristin Enron North America Corp From Kristin Gandy ENRON PM To Alyse nron cc Vince J CT Ann KoriothEnron nron Communications Terry nron Traci WarnerEnron nron Communications Erik CT Laura HowenstineEnron nron Communications Sarah nronXGate Subject Re Carnegie Interviews Super Friday Okay group it is Tuesday and we have heard from no volunteers We only need minutes of your time Is any one available on this Friday to interview Please Help Kristin From Alyse Herasimchuk PM To Vince J CT Ann KoriothEnron nron Communications Terry nron Traci WarnerEnron nron Communications Erik CT Laura HowenstineEnron nron Communications Sarah WesnerCorpEnron cc Kristin nron Subject Carnegie Interviews Super Friday We have one last group of candidates coming in for final round interviews on Friday January th We need Interviewers for half a day am to am Please let me know if you can be available for the entire morning or what times you could be available am am am am I appreciate any help you can offer in submitting names for those who may be able to interview if you can not Thanks Alyse Herasimchuk Recruiting Coordinator Associate Analyst Program

Re Carnegie Mellon Team MeetingI do not have a phone right now so I will have to call as soon as they get me up and running I went ahead and sent out the dates we have on schedule currently with the intention that if we get new dates they will be announced in the team meeting on Thursday Hope that is okay I needed to get a message out to participant soon so we dont get in a bind in a couple of weeks Kristin Vince J CT AM To Kristin NRON cc Vince J CT Subject Re Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Kristin What about the visit to the campus on Nov Any resolution Vince Kristin NRON AM To Vince J CT Kent nron Dorothy NRON Kevin NRON Andre BeskrowniEnron nron Communications Gaurav CT John NRON John B nron Dave ateway cc Judy CT Subject Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Greetings Carnegie Mellon Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at Carnegie Mellon University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Carnegie Mellons Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus December and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for August st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

Carnegie Mellon Team Meeting Cc Carnegie Mellon Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at Carnegie Mellon University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Carnegie Mellons Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus December and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for August st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

MIT Team Meeting Cc MIT Recruiting Team Each of you has been chosen to represent Enron for our Fall recruiting efforts at MIT University As part of the team you will be challenged with choosing the best candidates from Sloans Graduate School to join our Associate Program Our first campus event will be on September and interviews will be held on campus November and I hope you are all able to participate in the exciting process of recruiting young talent We will be more formally organising ourselves in the next couple of weeks Currently we are planning to have a brief team meeting in order to make introductions inform you about the Associate Program and discuss the fall recruiting calendar To that end please contact me with any questions or comments you may have The team meeting date is set for September st at am in room C Please RSVP to me as soon as possible I look forward to meeting you all soon Sincerely Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter x

Re Recruiting at CarnegieMellonam so sorry that we keep missing one another Are you available at any time tomorrow so I can come visit to talk about Carnegie Mellon recruiting this fall Kristin Vince J CT PM To John B NRON cc Vince J CT Kristin nron Subject Re Recruiting at CarnegieMellon John I havent received the invitation yet to the Sep th meeting I shall contact you Thursday regarding the CMU presentation Vince John B NRON PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Recruiting at CarnegieMellon Vince I understand that you are the lead recruiter for CMU As you know I am the only alum from that school in Enrons Associate Program I assume I will be joining you for our corporate presentation on at am Please let me know what I can do to help prepare for this event Enron and GSIA are a great fit so I want this recruiting effort to go well Are you also giving a talklecture to the computational finance students If so what time Maybe we can schedule a lunch with Duane Seppi I look forward to hearing from you John Gordon

Wharton Tiger Teamto the information that Christie Patrick emailed me the following people are assigned to Whartons Tiger Teams and These candidates per Vince Kaminskis request should receive offers for Summer Associate positions located in his Research Group Tiger Team Vincent Chen Mallik Deepa Jack Rejtman Kim Whitsel Tulika Bhalia Nicholas Levitt I am uncertain based on the emailed information from Christie if this is a student or a TA Can either Vince or Christie verify this information please Tiger Team Clay DeGiacinto Steve Lessar Vittal Maheshram Omar Bassel Dennis Feerick Marc Jason Cummins The following candidates interviewed with the regular on campus Wharton team on and were not passed onto the second round interviews With that information I am not sure if we will offer those candidates positions for the summer program Kim Whitsel Team Clay DeGiacinto Team Gustavo Pallazzi Team Edson Otani Team I also have that Heather Thorne is the teaching assistant and Donna Piazze is the professor for the project Can you also verify that information Vince if you would please verify and give me the okay via email then I will contact these candidates by phone to inform them they will be receiving an offer from Enron But before I do anything I want to make sure this information is correct and I am not excluding or adding any members that should receive an offer Thank you Kristin Gandy

RICE IMPORTANTThere is no need to contact Jebb Hutton he just declined our summer offer via phone with me A little bird told me that out of the candidates Enron has extended offers to for the summer are wavering The competition is between Enron and either consulting or investment companies Please take minutes to contact each candidate via phone or email so they will have the opportunity to get acquainted with other Enron employees Candidate cultivation is very important in helping a candidate decide between two different firms If you do not feel comfortable answering any of the candidates questions feel free to direct them my way Candidate Name Contact Email Address Michael Finger Jeff Wolfe Josh Webber Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT undergrad recruitingHello Rick and Sally My name is Kristin Gandy and I wanted to introduce myself As you probably already know Lexi Elliott recently passed UT recruiting onto me I was wondering if you both had some time next week to get together I would like to formally meet you as well as discuss Fall recruiting and the strategy Lexi and I have already worked on Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter Enron Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas

RE UT undergrad recruitingSally Thank you for your email message It looks like we will be meeting next week I will see you then and look forward to working with you this season Regards Kristin Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Monday June AM To Gandy Kristin Cc Thompson Patti Subject RE UT undergrad recruiting Kristin I know that we would like to get together with you to discuss UT recruiting The easiest way to get this set up is probably for you to coordinate with our two assistants on a time that will work My assistant is Patti Thompson x and Ricks assistant is Sharron Westbrook By copy of this note I will ask Patti to coordinate with Sharron and one of the two will get back with you to let you know available dates and times that Rick and I could get with you Sally Original Message From Gandy Kristin Sent Thursday May PM To Causey Richard Beck Sally Subject UT undergrad recruiting Hello Rick and Sally My name is Kristin Gandy and I wanted to introduce myself As you probably already know Lexi Elliott recently passed UT recruiting onto me I was wondering if you both had some time next week to get together I would like to formally meet you as well as discuss Fall recruiting and the strategy Lexi and I have already worked on Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter Enron Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas

RE UT Fall Lyceum Series Cc Lexi Elliott forwarded me this message concerning the Lyceum date that Rick Joseph would like Rick Causey to speak at on Sept th But we are confused as to what the first date of Sept th is and what this engagement is concerning Please Help Is anyone already slotted to speak at this engagement Regards Kristin Original Message From Elliott Lexi Sent Wednesday June PM To Gandy Kristin Subject FW UT Fall Lyceum Series kg I didnt know anything about September Is that something you set up I completely skipped over that sentence when I read this the st time We need to figure this out ASAP Original Message From Causey Richard Sent Wednesday June PM To Beck Sally Price Brent A Elliott Lexi Subject FW UT Fall Lyceum Series Please note this on your calendar for next year Also does anyone have the Monday September th date down Original Message From Richard Joseph ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRichardJosephCrjosephmailEutex asEeduE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June PM To Subject UT Fall Lyceum Series Hi Rick Im in the process of planning the UT Fourth Year PPA Fall Lyceum series scheduled for every Wednesday in the fall As you know this series brings to campus distinguished practitioners who address our th Year PPAs the equivalent of college seniors on current issues in accounting and current trends in business Last year you delivered a presentation in this Lyceum on Global Equity Markets Id like to invite you back this year to make a presentation on Wednesday September from to pm new time in UTC A This presentation would be in addition to the Enron company presentation scheduled for Monday September at the same time and place Please let me know if the Wednesday date is convenient for you and the topic you would like to discuss Also let me know if I can facilitate your presentation in any way Best wishes Rick Richard J Joseph Senior Lecturer and Director Master of Professional Accounting Degree Programs The University of Texas at Austin Graduate School of Business CBA M Austin Texas Office Fax

UT DinnerCultivation of UT Fall Associates Tomorrow evening at pm I have made reservations for Louis to congratulate the two UT Fall candidates that accepted Enrons offer Also invited are the candidates who are first and second years on loan from Enron If you are available please RSVP to me as soon as possible Thank you and I look forward to a successful Spring Season Regards Kristin

UT Spring Interviews Cc Spring Interviews Went Great Enron has extended offers for the Summer Associate Program to the following candidates Candidate Name Contact Enron Buddy Please call your assigned candidate at least once Randy Katz Shawn Cumberland Bryan Williams Craig Childers Eric Schnelder Pete Hayes Charlie Weldon Kevin Kuykendall Ken Brock Gwynn Gorsuch Jeff Bartlett Paul Broderick Alan McKnight Ben Glisan Mark Schlueter Sean Keenan Vance Holtzman Billy Braddock Ellen Fowler David Mitchell If I forgot someone and you would like to call a candidate please feel free to contact any one of the individuals listed above Since candidate cultivation is so important I have assigned members from the team to contact each candidate directly Even if you leave a voice message with a contact phone number that gives the candidate an opportunity to meet other members of Enrons UT team If you do not feel comfortable answering any of the candidates questions feel free to direct them my way Also if you would like to call more candidates than just one feel free to call as many as you would like Thank you for your help and support and I want to give a huge thanks to Paul Burkhart Mark Gandy Webb Jennings Drew Tingleaf and Charlie Weldon who helped with first round interviews As well as Paul Racicot and George McCormick who helped with second round interviews Lets cultivated these candidates so this season we have out of accepts Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

Offer Letter RevisionsUT Candidates As most of you have already heard unfortunately Becky Bruce is no longer with Enron My name is Kristin Gandy and I will be taken over recruiting for UT I wanted to send you a quick email to let you know about some changes we are making Attached please find a document with information containing Enrons offer letter revisions Have a wonderful holiday season and I hope to hear from you soon Please contact me at if you have any questions Thank you Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT Candidate CultivationUT Team Were in a critical time in the recruiting process as offers have been extended and we need to make sure theyre accepted In order to ensure cultivation of the UT candidates who received offers we have assigned each of you to a team of candidates to call at least once before the Holidays The teams are designed so there is an executive lead an experienced Enron representative andor an associate All members of the cultivation team should contact each candidate assigned to their team each week If the executive leads want to develop a more detailed strategy for their cultivation team that is fine Each week the associate should report to me about the candidates on their team letting me know about any issues or concerns The deadline for offer acceptance has been extended to January nd Please communicate this to all candidates and make sure to let them know if the paperwork is not in our office by January nd we will assume they are declining If you have any questions or do not feel that you have the time to devote to this please let me know so we can replace you I really appreciate your help Dont forget to call everyone at least once before the Holidays because they will be leaving campus for Christmas break soon Team Candidates Lead David Haug Niraj Parikh Thomas Suffield Monique Salazar Ellen Fowler Todd Preheim Kyle Kettler Jonathan Mueller Paul Broderick Roman Stephens Mark Gandy Jennifer Martinez Peter Hayes John Massey Gwynn Gorsuch Team Candidates Lead Shawn Cumberland Nadeem Abdullah Gary Hickerson Scott Conner Ben Glisan Thomas Dalton Kevin Kuykendall Jacee Burnes Jeff Bartlett Ross Mesquita Sean Keenan David Mitchell Paul Burkhart Billy Braddock To the best of my knowledge we have had no acceptances or declines from UT but if you have more up to date information please past it my way If there is a member of the team I have left off the distribution list and wants to participate please let me know Thank you again Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT Candidate CultivationTeam I just got word that Monique Salazar and Nadeem Abdullah have already accepted the offer to come to Enron So please call and congratulate them rather than cultivate The only formal decline we have received is from Scott Conner so unless you would like to try and sway him to Enron there is no need to contact him Also for clarification if you have a candidate name next to your name in the team roster please contact only that candidate Ex David Haug will only call Niraj Parikh If you do not have a candidate name next to your name please call all the candidates on your team list Ex Jennifer Martinez will call all candidates on her team The hope is that these candidates will feel a sense of belonging and want to come to Enron The candidates will appreciate someone from Enron who takes the time out to call and it shows our people care If you have any further questions please feel free to contact me anytime Kristin Forwarded by Kristin GandyNAEnron on PM RE Summer BuddiesHis number is Thank you for being a buddy Kristin Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Friday June PM To Gandy Kristin Subject RE Summer Buddies Kristin Can I get Michael Fingers phone number Ive had no luck finding him Thanks Charlie Original Message From Gandy Kristin Sent Monday June PM To Weldon V Charles Subject Summer Buddies Dear Intern Buddy Thank you for volunteering to assist the AnalystAssociate Program with candidate cultivation this summer Summer internships are very important to the overall success of our program and we need your help to insure that our interns have enjoyable and meaningful experiences this summer We have assigned you to be Michael Fingers summer buddy To kick off the summer the AA Program will be hosting a Meet the Pool party on Thursday June th at the Hyatt Regency from PM to PM We would like for you to use this opportunity to meet your summer buddy and to introduce them to others in the pool Please make contact with your buddy as soon as possible to make plans to attend the party together In addition to attending this party together we would like for you to spend a little time each week with your buddy We will send out an email next week with some suggested things for you and your buddy to do together Whether it is lunch or a simple phone call your continued interaction with these interns could make a difference in the interns decision to join Enron fulltime Suggestions from you are always welcomed As we progress through the summer please make an attempt to gain insight into your buddys internship Any feedback from them regarding their summer experiences will be welcomed positive or negative If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at x Thanks again for your help Sincerely Ted Bland

Summer BuddiesCharlespst Dear Intern Buddy Thank you for volunteering to assist the AnalystAssociate Program with candidate cultivation this summer Summer internships are very important to the overall success of our program and we need your help to insure that our interns have enjoyable and meaningful experiences this summer We have assigned you to be Michael Fingers summer buddy To kick off the summer the AA Program will be hosting a Meet the Pool party on Thursday June th at the Hyatt Regency from PM to PM We would like for you to use this opportunity to meet your summer buddy and to introduce them to others in the pool Please make contact with your buddy as soon as possible to make plans to attend the party together In addition to attending this party together we would like for you to spend a little time each week with your buddy We will send out an email next week with some suggested things for you and your buddy to do together Whether it is lunch or a simple phone call your continued interaction with these interns could make a difference in the interns decision to join Enron fulltime Suggestions from you are always welcomed As we progress through the summer please make an attempt to gain insight into your buddys internship Any feedback from them regarding their summer experiences will be welcomed positive or negative If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at x Thanks again for your help Sincerely Ted Bland

UT Spring Interviews Cc Spring Interviews Went Great Enron has extended offers for the Summer Associate Program to the following candidates Candidate Name Contact Enron Buddy Please call your assigned candidate at least once Randy Katz Shawn Cumberland Bryan Williams Craig Childers Eric Schnelder Pete Hayes Charlie Weldon Kevin Kuykendall Ken Brock Gwynn Gorsuch Jeff Bartlett Paul Broderick Alan McKnight Ben Glisan Mark Schlueter Sean Keenan Vance Holtzman Billy Braddock Ellen Fowler David Mitchell If I forgot someone and you would like to call a candidate please feel free to contact any one of the individuals listed above Since candidate cultivation is so important I have assigned members from the team to contact each candidate directly Even if you leave a voice message with a contact phone number that gives the candidate an opportunity to meet other members of Enrons UT team If you do not feel comfortable answering any of the candidates questions feel free to direct them my way Also if you would like to call more candidates than just one feel free to call as many as you would like Thank you for your help and support and I want to give a huge thanks to Paul Burkhart Mark Gandy Webb Jennings Drew Tingleaf and Charlie Weldon who helped with first round interviews As well as Paul Racicot and George McCormick who helped with second round interviews Lets cultivated these candidates so this season we have out of accepts Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

Offer Letter RevisionsUT Candidates As most of you have already heard unfortunately Becky Bruce is no longer with Enron My name is Kristin Gandy and I will be taken over recruiting for UT I wanted to send you a quick email to let you know about some changes we are making Attached please find a document with information containing Enrons offer letter revisions Have a wonderful holiday season and I hope to hear from you soon Please contact me at if you have any questions Thank you Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT Candidate CultivationUT Team Were in a critical time in the recruiting process as offers have been extended and we need to make sure theyre accepted In order to ensure cultivation of the UT candidates who received offers we have assigned each of you to a team of candidates to call at least once before the Holidays The teams are designed so there is an executive lead an experienced Enron representative andor an associate All members of the cultivation team should contact each candidate assigned to their team each week If the executive leads want to develop a more detailed strategy for their cultivation team that is fine Each week the associate should report to me about the candidates on their team letting me know about any issues or concerns The deadline for offer acceptance has been extended to January nd Please communicate this to all candidates and make sure to let them know if the paperwork is not in our office by January nd we will assume they are declining If you have any questions or do not feel that you have the time to devote to this please let me know so we can replace you I really appreciate your help Dont forget to call everyone at least once before the Holidays because they will be leaving campus for Christmas break soon Team Candidates Lead David Haug Niraj Parikh Thomas Suffield Monique Salazar Ellen Fowler Todd Preheim Kyle Kettler Jonathan Mueller Paul Broderick Roman Stephens Mark Gandy Jennifer Martinez Peter Hayes John Massey Gwynn Gorsuch Team Candidates Lead Shawn Cumberland Nadeem Abdullah Gary Hickerson Scott Conner Ben Glisan Thomas Dalton Kevin Kuykendall Jacee Burnes Jeff Bartlett Ross Mesquita Sean Keenan David Mitchell Paul Burkhart Billy Braddock To the best of my knowledge we have had no acceptances or declines from UT but if you have more up to date information please past it my way If there is a member of the team I have left off the distribution list and wants to participate please let me know Thank you again Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT Candidate CultivationTeam I just got word that Monique Salazar and Nadeem Abdullah have already accepted the offer to come to Enron So please call and congratulate them rather than cultivate The only formal decline we have received is from Scott Conner so unless you would like to try and sway him to Enron there is no need to contact him Also for clarification if you have a candidate name next to your name in the team roster please contact only that candidate Ex David Haug will only call Niraj Parikh If you do not have a candidate name next to your name please call all the candidates on your team list Ex Jennifer Martinez will call all candidates on her team The hope is that these candidates will feel a sense of belonging and want to come to Enron The candidates will appreciate someone from Enron who takes the time out to call and it shows our people care If you have any further questions please feel free to contact me anytime Kristin Forwarded by Kristin GandyNAEnron on PM Subject UT Candidate Cultivation Hi UT Team Were in a critical time in the recruiting process as offers have been extended and we need to make sure theyre accepted In order to ensure cultivation of the UT candidates who received offers we have assigned each of you to a team of candidates to call at least once before the Holidays The teams are designed so there is an executive lead an experienced Enron representative andor an associate All members of the cultivation team should contact each candidate assigned to their team each week If the executive leads want to develop a more detailed strategy for their cultivation team that is fine Each week the associate should report to me about the candidates on their team letting me know about any issues or concerns The deadline for offer acceptance has been extended to January nd Please communicate this to all candidates and make sure to let them know if the paperwork is not in our office by January nd we will assume they are declining If you have any questions or do not feel that you have the time to devote to this please let me know so we can replace you I really appreciate your help Dont forget to call everyone at least once before the Holidays because they will be leaving campus for Christmas break soon Team Candidates Lead David Haug Niraj Parikh Thomas Suffield Monique Salazar Ellen Fowler Todd Preheim Kyle Kettler Jonathan Mueller Paul Broderick Roman Stephens Mark Gandy Jennifer Martinez Peter Hayes John Massey Gwynn Gorsuch Team Candidates Lead Shawn Cumberland Nadeem Abdullah Gary Hickerson Scott Conner Ben Glisan Thomas Dalton Kevin Kuykendall Jacee Burnes Jeff Bartlett Ross Mesquita Sean Keenan David Mitchell Paul Burkhart Billy Braddock To the best of my knowledge we have had no acceptances or declines from UT but if you have more up to date information please past it my way If there is a member of the team I have left off the distribution list and wants to participate please let me know Thank you again Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

Offer Letter RevisionsUT Candidates As most of you have already heard unfortunately Becky Bruce is no longer with Enron My name is Kristin Gandy and I will be taken over recruiting for UT I wanted to send you a quick email to let you know about some changes we are making Attached please find a document with information containing Enrons offer letter revisions Have a wonderful holiday season and I hope to hear from you soon Please contact me at if you have any questions Thank you Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter

UT Spring Interviews Cc Spring Interviews Went Great Enron has extended offers for the Summer Associate Program to the following candidates Candidate Name Contact Enron Buddy Please call your assigned candidate at least once Randy Katz Shawn Cumberland Bryan Williams Craig Childers Eric Schnelder Pete Hayes Charlie Weldon Kevin Kuykendall Ken Brock Gwynn Gorsuch Jeff Bartlett Paul Broderick Alan McKnight Ben Glisan Mark Schlueter Sean Keenan Vance Holtzman Billy Braddock Ellen Fowler David Mitchell If I forgot someone and you would like to call a candidate please feel free to contact any one of the individuals listed above Since candidate cultivation is so important I have assigned members from the team to contact each candidate directly Even if you leave a voice message with a contact phone number that gives the candidate an opportunity to meet other members of Enrons UT team If you do not feel comfortable answering any of the candidates questions feel free to direct them my way Also if you would like to call more candidates than just one feel free to call as many as you would like Thank you for your help and support and I want to give a huge thanks to Paul Burkhart Mark Gandy Webb Jennings Drew Tingleaf and Charlie Weldon who helped with first round interviews As well as Paul Racicot and George McCormick who helped with second round interviews Lets cultivated these candidates so this season we have out of accepts Regards Kristin Gandy Associate Recruiter
